meanings.def: happening or done once every year
examples: The 12th annual Music Festival runs from Friday 25th to Monday 28th October.
Funding will be awarded on an annual basis.
She organized this year's annual Christmas dinner dance.

meanings.def: relating to a period of one year
examples: an average annual growth rate of 8%
Our total annual costs have declined.
I have decided to take my annual leave to be with my wife and baby.

meanings.def: a book, especially one for children, that is published once a year, with the same title each time, but different contents
examples: The children usually asked for comic or sporting annuals for Christmas.

meanings.def: any plant that grows and dies within one year or season
